title: Biden predicts that if Supreme Court overturns Roe v. Wade, same-sex marriage will be next - CNN
content:
1. Biden predicts that if Supreme Court overturns Roe v. Wade, same-sex marriage will be next  CNN
  2. Roberts could persuade conservative SCOTUS justice not to overturn Roe v. Wade  Business Insider
  3. Fact-Checking Samuel Alitoâ€™s Opinion Overturning Roe v. Wade  The New York Times
  4. Justice Alito hearkens back to dark times  The Seattle Times
  5. Draft opinion would pave way for abortion ban in Idaho. Is gay marriage next target?  Idaho Statesman
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: President Joe Biden predicted Wednesday that if the Supreme Court officially overturns Roe v. Wade's holding of a federal constitutional right to abortion, the court will next look to strike down other landmark cases guaranteeing Americans' rights, from same-sex marriage to contraception access.
